name: 50 Rounds
description:
Do you think you have what it takes to fight through 50 rounds of zombies and bosses..? I doubt it.
Features
5 Unique bosses
6 Different weapons ( more coming soon! )
Zombies get stronger each wave
Killing zombies will give you EXP and Coins to spend on either new weapons, ammo or tomes for stat points.
- Marksmanship will increase the damage you do, Toughness your Max HP & HP Regen, and Agility will improve your move speed, You will also increase some stats each time you level up
